etymology.description: Semantic: 言(言) (yán, "speech") + Phonetic: 式(式) (shì, "form") = related to speaking or expressing via structured form -> test or experiment
etymology.interpretation: 試(試) (shì, "test") combines 言(言) (yán, "speech") for the semantic meaning of communication and 式(式) (shì, "form") as a phonetic guide, symbolizing the act of trying out or testing through structured verbal expressions or methods.
etymology.simplification: 試(試) was simplified to 试(試) by replacing 言(言) (yán, "speech") with 讠(讠) (yán, "speech") for a simpler form with the same phonetic component.

examples.chinese: 让我们试一试(讓我們試一試)。
他试着解决问题(他試著解決問題)，以求进步(以求進步)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shìzhe jiějué wèntí, yǐ qiú jìnbù.
examples.english: He is trying to solve the problem in order to make progress.

examples.chinese: 科学家试图发现新理论(科學家試圖發現新理論)。
examples.english: Scientists try to discover a new theory.
